member.name: P:QRCodeScanner.Maui.CameraView.PreviewHeight
member.summary: Only Android will be reflected this setting

member.name: P:QRCodeScanner.Maui.CameraView.PreviewWidth
member.summary: Only Android will be reflected this setting

member.name: P:QRCodeScanner.Maui.CameraView.RequestedFPS
member.summary: Only Android will be reflected this setting

member.name: P:QRCodeScanner.Maui.CameraView.ScanInterval
member.summary: Only iOS will be reflected this setting, Default is 500ms, minimum value is 100ms

member.name: P:QRCodeScanner.Maui.CameraView.IsScanning
member.summary: Disables or enables scanning

member.name: P:QRCodeScanner.Maui.CameraView.ReturnBarcodeImage
member.summary: Disables or enables returning the image which the barcode was read from.

member.name: P:QRCodeScanner.Maui.CameraView.TorchOn
member.summary: Disables or enables torch

member.name: P:QRCodeScanner.Maui.CameraView.CameraFacing
member.summary: Select Back or Front camera. Default value is Back Camera

member.name: P:QRCodeScanner.Maui.CameraView.CaptureQuality
member.summary: Set the capture quality for the image analysys. Reccomended and default value is Medium. Use highest values for more precision or lower for fast scanning.

member.name: M:QRCodeScanner.Maui.CameraView.CameraView_Unloaded(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Due to DisconnectHandler has to be called manually...we do it when the Window unloaded https://github.com/dotnet/maui/issues/3604
